description:
Does it sound logical to be afraid of a virus? ⁣
⁣
Of course not but in order to profit from the vaccines they have to first sell you the fake fear, misrepresented data and then comes the fraudulent science.⁣
⁣
Do you know who the media works for? $4 billion in pharmaceutical ad money a year to the major networks should be a big hint as to their intentions. Besides that watch any major news outlet and see how many stories are pushed that are designed to make you fear something or create negative emotions. Then the commercial breaks come with surprise surprise are typically drug ads.⁣
⁣
Vaccination (or anything pharma related) is about one thing and that's fear. Mass creation of fear to make you think the best choice for you and your child is to be injected with toxins, carcinogens, aborted fetal dna and the very virus you are hoping to avoid. It’s the most irrational idea that this will keep anyone healthy. You'll find that a virus is not marketed and pushed as deadly until the exact moment in time when the vaccine is available or about to be available for the public to receive. This exact timing of fear is then mass produced and programmed into every mind they can reach. ⁣
⁣
Rise above the fake fear. Become informed and awaken to the deception being used against you to.  Protect the children. Protect yourself. ⁣
⁣
Awaken my friends
